commitMessage:
@@@ISIS-2275: let ResourceAbstract no longer be a holder of ResourceContext

decouples the ResourceContext from the resource

@@@ISIS-2761: fixes Vaadin and JavaFX provisioning issues

so can work on a shared object-icon resolver utility

also changes the RO Viewer's object-icon resource href value 'image' ->
'object-icon'
@@@ISIS-2853: cover more failure paths with DomainObjectResourceServerside
